subject: Re: XHTMLUnit 0.9 released
msgSnippet: ... As a matter of fact, I forgot to include the binaries in the distribution. It can now be found in the distrib folder. Johannes
messageBody:
> XHTMLUnit 0.9 has been released.
>
> XHTMLUnit builds on JUnit and XMLUnit in order to provide testing and
> validation of generated (and static) XHTML code.
>
> Changes:
> - HTML4 compatibility mode
> - XML version tag supported
> - Introduction paper as DOC and PDF
>
> http://sourceforge.net/projects/xhtmlunit

As a matter of fact, I forgot to include the binaries in the
distribution. It can now be found in the "distrib" folder.

Johannes
